title: 1/12/15 Chapion Sales
body:
Hey guys

I was looking at buying a few champions and skins this sale period but no champs or skins appear in my client as on sale at all. is there a bug at your end our is it my client? i've tried restarting the client but nothing changes so if you could help it would be appreciated :)

replies.body: Yup! Sometimes you just have to wait a bit ;)
